title: Ministerial Order determining the Modalities of Facilitating Persons with Disabilities in Matters Relating to Communication
title_en: Ministerial Order determining the Modalities of Facilitating Persons with Disabilities in Matters Relating to Communication

provisions.title: Article One – Purpose of this Order
provisions.content: This Order determines the modalities of facilitating persons with disabilities who are in the first and second categories in matters relating to communication.

provisions.title: Article 2 – Modalities of interpreting for persons with disabilities
provisions.content: The public and private audio-visual press shall, within the limits of available resources, adopt appropriate modalities of interpreting in order to facilitate persons with disabilities to follow their programs.

provisions.title: Article 3 – Repealing provision
provisions.content: All prior legal provisions contrary to this Order are hereby repealed.

provisions.title: Article 4 – Commencement
provisions.content: This Order shall come into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda.
